featured.text: When the Spanish explorers went to Mexico, they saw the Aztec kings 15 umbrellas.
The plant was considered sacred by the ancient Aztecs, and modern-day Mexicans eat it, drink it, and even use it in medicines and shampoos.

definition.zh_def: 阿茲特克人，指古代墨西哥的一個印第安文明，以其高度發展的社會結構和文化著稱。
definition.en_def: The Aztecs were an ancient civilization in Mexico known for their advanced social structure and culture.
definition.example: The Aztec civilization built impressive pyramids and developed a complex calendar.
